body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain +1 to the DC of any saving throws against necromancy spells that they cast. Members of this race with a Wisdom score of 11 or higher also gain the following spell-like abilities: 1/day—bleed, chill touch, detect poison, touch of fatigue. The caster level for these effects is equal to the user's character level. The DC for these spell-like abilities is equal to 10 + the spell's level + the user's Wisdom modifier.
name: Fell Magic
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Fell Magic
